data.name: SettingsSaved
data.comment: Success message when settings are saved

data.name: SettingsReset
data.comment: Success message when settings are reset to defaults

data.name: SettingsLoaded
data.comment: Success message when settings are loaded

data.name: ProfileCreated
data.comment: Success message when a profile is created

data.name: ProfileUpdated
data.comment: Success message when a profile is updated

data.name: ProfileDeleted
data.comment: Success message when a profile is deleted

data.name: ProfilesSaved
data.comment: Success message when profiles are saved

data.name: MainViewModelInitialized
data.comment: Log message when MainViewModel is initialized

data.name: GameProfileLauncherInitialized
data.comment: Log message when game profile launcher is initialized

data.name: UpdateNotificationViewModelInitialized
data.comment: Log message when UpdateNotificationViewModel is initialized

data.name: LocalizationServiceInitialized
data.comment: Log message when LocalizationService is initialized. {0} is culture name

data.name: CultureChanged
data.comment: Log message when culture is changed. {0} is the new culture name

data.name: AvailableCulturesRefreshed
data.comment: Log message when available cultures are refreshed. {0} is culture count

data.name: AddedDefaultCulture
data.comment: Log message when default culture is added. {0} is culture name

data.name: DiscoveredLanguages
data.comment: Log message for discovered languages. {0} is count, {1} is comma-separated list

data.name: FoundSatelliteAssembly
data.comment: Log message when satellite assembly is found. {0} is culture name

data.name: CreatedResourceManager
data.comment: Log message when ResourceManager is created. {0} is base name

data.name: UpdateCheckCompleted
data.comment: Log message when update check completes. {0} is true/false

data.name: GameScanCompleted
data.value: Game scan completed successfully. Found {0} installations
data.comment: Success message when game scan completes. {0} is installation count

data.name: OperationCompleted
data.comment: Generic operation completion message

data.name: DataSaved
data.comment: Generic data save success message

data.name: ImportSuccessful
data.comment: Success message for import operations

data.name: ExportSuccessful
data.comment: Success message for export operations
